meanings.definition: The most extreme or superlative form of darn.
meanings.sent1: She always gives her darndests effort in everything she does.
meanings.sent2: The cake she baked was the darndests dessert I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: He wore the darndests hat to the party, and everyone loved it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the darndests ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The darndests of all the flowers in the garden was a vibrant red rose.

meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express frustration or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Darndests! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent2: Darndests, why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent3: Darndests, I can't believe I missed the bus.
meanings.sent4: The darndests rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: Darndests, that was the last piece of cake!
